content.question: Which of the following expressions is equivalent to <math alttext="log subscript 3 open parentheses x to the power of 5 close parentheses"><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mfenced><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>5</mn></msup></mfenced></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="fraction numerator log subscript 3 x over denominator log subscript 3 5 end fraction"><mfrac><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mn>5</mn></mrow></mfrac></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
